ref: 12126 vēśa3 m. ʻ prostitution ʼ Mn. Pāṇ.gaṇa, ʻ brothel ʼ Mn. [From vḗṣa -- 1 m. ʻ work ʼ, vēṣá -- ʻ working ʼ VS. (viṣṭi -- 2 f. ʻ service, (coll.) servants, slaves ʼ MBh., vēṣya -- n. ʻ work ʼ TāṇḍBr.) infl. by vḗśa -- 2 (as ʻ house ʼ or as ʻ ingress ʼ): cf. further vēśasthā -- f. ʻ prostitute ʼ Br., vēśastrī -- , vēśyastrī -- f. MBh. (whence vēśyā -- Mn.). Semant. cf. bandhakī -- f. ʻ prostitute ʼ MBh., bandistrī-<-> f. ʻ apsaras ʼ (J. C. W.)]
